my favorite movie genre is horror.
I miss my family terribly, but I am happy with my new life.

i play many instruments.

content.text: I'm trying to get into reading more. Any book recommendations?
I'm a big fan of horror, but I've also been reading a lot of classics lately.
I love horror too! Any recent horror books you'd recommend?
I recently read The Twisted Ones and really enjoyed it. It's about a family who moves into a new house and discovers that it's haunted by a terrifying creature.
That sounds really good! I'll check it out.
Cool! I've also been reading a lot of books about cults lately.
Cults are so interesting! I've been listening to a lot of podcasts about them.
Have you heard of the Heaven's Gate cult?
Yes! I've heard some really crazy things about them.
They're definitely one of the most interesting cults out there.
I'm definitely going to have to check out some books about them.
Cool! I'm sure you'll find them really interesting.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about books!
